superheadline=""][/bt_header][bt_hr top_spaced="not-spaced" bottom_spaced="bottomSmallSpaced" transparent_border="noBorder" el_class="" el_style=""][/bt_hr][/bt_column][/bt_row][bt_row][bt_column width="1/2" align="right" vertical_align="inherit" cell_padding="default" animation="animate animate-fadein animate-moveright" text_indent="no_text_indent" el_class="" el_style="" border="no_border" background_color="" transparent=""][bt_service icon="f1b9" url="" headline="Test your garage door opener" text="Test your garage door opener monthly to ensure that it reverses when it hits an obstruction or when its sensor beam is interrupted." icon_type="borderless"][/bt_service][bt_service icon="f0ce" url="" headline="Inspect, and possibly change out HVAC filters" text="Many experts will say to change the filters monthly, but that’s not always necessary. For smaller families without pets or allergies, you’ll likely be okay changing the filters every 2-3 months." icon_type="borderless"][/bt_service][bt_service icon="f111" url="" headline="Clean kitchen sink disposal." text="There are a bunch of ways to do this, but the handiest and best all-around solution seems to be vinegar ice cubes." icon_type="borderless"][/bt_service][bt_service icon="f06d" url="" headline="Inspect your fire extinguisher(s)" text="This inspection doesn’t require much: ensure it has easy access, that the gauge shows adequate pressure, and that it has no visible signs of wear and tear." icon_type="borderless"][/bt_service][/bt_column][bt_column width="1/2" align="left" vertical_align="inherit" cell_padding="default" animation="animate animate-fadein animate-moveleft" text_indent="no_text_indent" el_class="" el_style="" border="no_border" background_color="" transparent=""][bt_service icon="f087" url="" headline="Test smoke/carbon dioxide detectors" text="Another simple task; your detectors should have a “test” button. If the alarm sounds, you’re good to go. If not, replace batteries immediately and test again. " icon_type="borderless"][/bt_service][bt_service icon="f1fc" url="" headline="Give your house a deep clean" text="Take one Saturday every six months with your whole family, and give the whole house a proper deep clean. Appliances, windows, dusting every nook and cranny (including the basement), etc." icon_type="borderless"][/bt_service][bt_service icon="f015" url="" headline="Inspect the exterior of your home" text="Is any paint chipping? Is any siding damaged from winter? Are there any holes in your brick?" icon_type="borderless"][/bt_service][bt_service icon="f17a" url="" headline="Repair/replace damaged window screens" text="You don’t want bugs making their way in because you missed a hole in a window screen. And no, duct tape doesn’t count. It can be a quick fix, but don’t leave it for long. It just looks bad." icon_type="borderless"][/bt_service][/bt_column][/bt_row][/bt_section][bt_section layout="boxed" top_spaced="topExtraSpaced" bottom_spaced="bottomExtraSpaced" skin="inherit" full_screen="no" ghost="no" scroll_info="no" scroll_info_text="" divider="yes" back_image="" back_video="" video_settings="" parallax="" parallax_offset="" el_id="get-a-quote" el_class="" el_style=""][bt_row][bt_column width="1/2" align="center" vertical_align="inherit" border="no_border" cell_padding="default" animation="animate animate-fadein animate-moveright" text_indent="no_text_indent" background_color="" transparent="" el_class="" el_style=""][bt_header headline="Get a quick quote..." headline_size="medium" subheadline="Loram ipsum sit amet" dash="bottom" superheadline=""][/bt_header][bt_quote_booking admin_email="info@bold-themes.com" m_email="" m_name="Mandatory" m_phone="" m_address="" m_message="" m_date="" m_time="" el_class="" el_style="" time_start="09:00" time_end="18:00" currency="$" subject="Lorem Ipsum"][bt_hr top_spaced="topSmallSpaced" bottom_spaced="bottomSmallSpaced" transparent_border="border" el_class="" el_style=""][/bt_hr][bt_quote_item name="Approx.
